text: Alperton is a London Underground station on the Uxbridge branch of the Piccadilly Line. The station is between Sudbury Town and Park Royal. It is on Ealing Road (A4089 road) a short distance from the junction with Bridgewater Road (A4005) and is close to Alperton Bus Garage and the Paddington branch of the Grand Union Canal. The station is in Travelcard Zone 4. ==Services== The typical off-peak service is a train in each direction every ten minutes. Half of northbound trains terminate at Rayners Lane and the other half continue to the terminus of the line at Uxbridge. ==References== * * ==Other websites== *London's Transport Museum Photographic Archive ** ** ** ** Showing structure of reinforced concrete roof ** ** With appearance marred by rooftop safety barriers Category:Piccadilly line stations Category:Transport in the London Borough of Brent Category:London Travelcard zone 4 Category:Buildings and structures in the London Borough of Brent
title: Alperton tube station
